item.title: Two questions to change your life better
item.description: Suddenly remembered a long-time watched movie,Â The Bucket List There is a scene hardly forgotten when Morgan Freeman telling a story about Ancient Egypt belief of God.It is said that when you die, God himself will ask you two question: Do you find joy in your life? Had your life brought joys to others? and if you had, he would then ask another question Letâ€™s be honest to ourselves, and start to make a new end to our life ðŸ™‚
